title: Panel, ca. 1900
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave
description: Large panel of undyed, loosely woven cotton cloth block printed in gold with and all-over pattern of tangent roundels with griffon-like creatures facing left and right in alternation. Border of another Fortuny print of scrolling vine and leaf forms in gold on a dark blue ground. Faced with loosely woven undyed cotton cloth.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, ca. 1900.Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave. 1951-112-12.
